column4: i want to make a word file using john and using ">" to input it into a file, is there a way to limit the amount of bytes that the file becomes?
if the output is line based, you may use 'head'
e.g. your_prog | head -n 2000 > yourfile   # the first 2000 lines.
cool ill check it out thanks
i just generated 200000 words in less then a second using those commands... i didn't know john was that fast
